aboutUs.title: Ukranian eco rescue foundation
aboutUs.description: We are a team of like-minded individuals: ecologists, eco-activists, experts from environmental institutions, and concerned Ukrainians who are fully aware of the dire consequences of the full-scale hostile aggression for the ecological situation in Ukraine.

forest.title: save our forest
forest.text: Forests are legendary treasures of nature. We work on multiple fronts to conserve and restore forest ecosystems.

water.title: water refine
water.text: Water is a vital resource for life. We aim to ensure clean water for all and combat water pollution.

animals.title: save animals
animals.text: Biodiversity is a crucial part of our nature. We strive to protect and restore animal populations.

eco.title: eco system
eco.text: Balanced ecosystems are the foundation of life on Earth. We work to preserve and restore the ecological balance.
